title: Strengthening Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Age-Specific Multimedia Learning Optimization Design for 30-Year-Old Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language learning experience and understanding of office work environments
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand work-related language expressions with over 80% accuracy using multimedia materials.
Learners can explain three or more multimedia learning strategies tailored to age-specific cognitive characteristics.
In a PBL environment, learners can complete language projects collaboratively with peers at over 90% completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
